concept.title: Cleaning of Contact Surfaces and Tools

p.div:
Any Rolls, machine areas or components, and tools that have come in contact should be cleaned using an appropriate cleaning solution (solvent, alcohol, water, ...) for the coating liquid that was used.
Pay more attention to the following product contact parts:
The area underneath the Slot Die.
All Rolls that form the web path from the Primary Unwind to the Rewind (including the Idler Rolls in the Dryer).
All tools that have been used. Determine and inspect All of the obvious places that might come into contact with the coating liquid have been cleaned, all other machine surfaces should be wiped and cleaned as well.
